DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomized double-blind clinical trial anatomical single-bundle anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) reconstruction . One common cause ACL reconstruction failure poor graft positioning . There evidence graft placement align native insertion site result superior clinical outcome . Current anatomic ACL reconstruction concept highlight importance native anatomy restore physiological knee kinematics accurately . This study aim investigate clinical outcome dynamic knee stability force platform functional test ACL reconstruction two different group tunnel position : anteromedial ACL footprint ( AM ) central ACL footprint . It hypothesize would clinical dynamic stability difference AM Central tunnel group ACL reconstruction .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Dynamic Knee Stability Functional Outcomes Anatomical ACL Reconstruction AM Central Position
